page.title: 01A GENERAL VIEW
page.content: The main village in our area is Ashover and the rest of the area is mainly grassland,fields,farmland.It is hilly and has valleys in a North West South East direction.The River Amber runs to the South end of our area.And there are three other streams,the Marsh Brook,Smally Brook and Hodgelane Brook.Above Ashover there is a rock called the Fabrick.If you stand on the top you can see all around you for miles.There are pictures of animals engraved on the rocks near the Fabrick.The animals are ducks, goats, pigs, dogs and doves.Ashover itself is a beautiful country village and a really pretty place to live. By Jane Stevens Nikki Walton Georgie Browne
